panels.title: Cpu Capacity Hz
RX/TX Packets Per Sec on VMs

panels.description: Price a year with commit and without commit
panels.title: Price per year running on VMware

targets.expr:
(sum by (hostname) (label_replace(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode!="idle",instance=~".*nova.*|.*compute.*",os_region="$cluster"}[3m]), "hostname", "$1", "instance", "(.*)")))
 / on(hostname) group_left sum by (hostname)(((sum by (hostname) (label_replace(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~".*nova.*|.*compute.*",os_region="$cluster"}[3m]), "hostname", "$1", "instance", "(.*)"))))) * 100 + on (hostname) group_left(availability_zone) 0 * (openstack_nova_running_vms{os_region="$cluster"} )

panels.title: Top $TopItems VMs by vCPU Steal Time
Volumes Close to ${iops_limit} write iOPS Limit
Volumes Close to $iops_limit Read iOPS Limit

targets.expr:
label_replace(
  avg(purefa_volume_performance_throughput_iops{os_region=~"$cluster", dimension="writes_per_sec", name=~"volume-.*"}) by (instance,name),
  "id", "$1", "name", "volume-(.*)-cinder"
)
* on(id) group_left(volume_name, size, status, tenant_id, volume_type)
# Then, rename the name label to volume_name in the Cinder data
(label_replace(
  label_replace(
    openstack_cinder_volume_gb{os_region=~"$cluster"},
    "volume_name", "$1", "name", "(.*)"
  ),
  "name", "volume-$1-cinder", "id", "(.*)"
) * 0 + 1)
and
topk($TopItems, 
  label_replace(
    avg(rate(purefa_volume_performance_throughput_iops{os_region=~"$cluster", dimension="writes_per_sec", name=~"volume-.*"}[$__range] @ end() )) by (instance,name),
    "id", "$1", "name", "volume-(.*)-cinder"
  )
  * on(id) group_left(volume_name, size, status, tenant_id, volume_type)
  (label_replace(
    label_replace(
      openstack_cinder_volume_gb{os_region=~"$cluster"},
      "volume_name", "$1", "name", "(.*)"
    ),
    "name", "volume-$1-cinder", "id", "(.*)"
  ) * 0 + 1)
)

panels.title: Top $TopItems Volumes for Write IOPs Pure

targets.expr:
# First, extract the ID from the Pure volume name and add it as a label
label_replace(
  avg(purefa_volume_performance_throughput_iops{os_region=~"$cluster", dimension="reads_per_sec", name=~"volume-.*"}) by (instance,name),
  "id", "$1", "name", "volume-(.*)-cinder"
)
* on(id) group_left(volume_name, size, status, tenant_id, volume_type)
# Then, rename the name label to volume_name in the Cinder data
(label_replace(
  label_replace(
    openstack_cinder_volume_gb{os_region=~"$cluster"},
    "volume_name", "$1", "name", "(.*)"
  ),
  "name", "volume-$1-cinder", "id", "(.*)"
) * 0 + 1)
and
topk($TopItems, 
  label_replace(
    avg(rate(purefa_volume_performance_throughput_iops{os_region=~"$cluster", dimension="reads_per_sec", name=~"volume-.*"}[$__range] @ end() )) by (instance,name),
    "id", "$1", "name", "volume-(.*)-cinder"
  )
  * on(id) group_left(volume_name, size, status, tenant_id, volume_type)
  (label_replace(
    label_replace(
      openstack_cinder_volume_gb{os_region=~"$cluster"},
      "volume_name", "$1", "name", "(.*)"
    ),
    "name", "volume-$1-cinder", "id", "(.*)"
  ) * 0 + 1)
)

panels.title: Top $TopItems Volumes for Read IOPs Pure

targets.expr:
avg(rate(libvirt_domain_block_stats_write_requests_total{domain=~"$virtual_machine",job=~"libvirt_exporter",compute=~"$compute",os_region=~"$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (domain, target_device,compute)
+
topk($TopItems,(avg(rate(libvirt_domain_block_stats_write_requests_total{domain=~"$virtual_machine",job=~"libvirt_exporter",compute=~"$compute",os_region=~"$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (domain, target_device, compute)@ end()))
